title: LOST Places
name: LOST Places
description:
A Map by Burk504

A map of all the places in the world that are mentioned on ABC's LOST.

properties.description: Posted by Sulojaarmas

Posted by Burk5044 8 15 16 23 42The location that I get when I put the LOST numbers into Google Maps and Platial. So why do so many people believe that it is a place in the pacific? Probably because the truth isn\'t fun?

properties.name: Ana Lucia's shooter is picked up in Echo Park
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing751 Echo Park Ave, Los Angeles, 90026Ana Lucia led the other half of the survivors on the other side of the island. She is haunted by the loss of her unborn child when she was shot in the line of duty as a police officer.

properties.name: Black Rock on its way from Mozambique?
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingMozambiqueLocke guesses that the Black Rock was on its way from Mozambique when it crashed on the island.

properties.name: Black Rock's home port?
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingPortsmouth, EnglandPortsmouth may be the home port of the Black Rock, a mysterious old slave ship they find on the island. The survivors go to the Black Rock to get ancient dynamite to try to blow the lid off the capsule.

properties.name: Cairo University
properties.description: Posted by Burk504giza, egyptWhere Sayid went to college

properties.name: Charley breaks a girl's heart in Knightsbridge
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing knightsbridge, EnglandAfter Drive Shaft has broken up, Charlie is broke and addicted to heroin. He seduces a young lady in order to steal something from her, but ends up falling for her and dreaming of giving up drugs to live an above-board life. He falters and she finds out everything and is heartbroken.

properties.name: Charlie Pace's Hometown
properties.description: Posted by Burk504manchester, englandThis is where he and his brother formed their band, DriveShaft

properties.name: Destination of flight 815
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishinglos Angeles International AirportThis is where Oceanic flight 815 was headed

properties.name: Drive Shaft's big hit
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Added to YouTube on April 11, 2006, 07:05 AM by fr1day5ch1ld

properties.name: Eko Takes his Brother's Place Going to London
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingLondonEko\'s brother Yemi was supposed to go to London to continue his studies. When Eko takes his brother\'s place, he also takes his place in London. Is it from London that Eko is sent to see the girl in Australia who came back from the dead?

properties.name: Essam's terror cell steals explosives
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingmelbourne, AustraliaEssam\'s terror cell stole 300 lbs of explosives from a base outside Melbourne. I searched in vain for an army base in Melbourne, but couldn\'t find one, so I put the marker in Melboune Sayid came to Australia to help capture the leader of the terror cell, using his former friend to infiltrate. He convinced his friend that he would go with him on a suicide bombing mission. The friend commits suicide but spares Sayid when he learns of the betrayal.

properties.name: Ethan claims to be from Ontario
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingOntario, CanadaEthan is so scary. He sure doesn\'t act like a Canadian.

properties.name: Home of Claire Littleton
properties.description: Posted by Burk504sydney, australia

properties.name: Home of Michael Dawson
properties.description: Posted by Burk504new york, ny

properties.name: Iowa
properties.description: Posted by Burk504iowa, usaKate Austen\'s home state. Her exact hometown has yet to be revealed.

properties.name: Jack learned to play poker in Phuket
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingPhuket, ThailandWhat else did Jack learn in Phuket?

properties.name: Jae-Lee fell in love at Harvard
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000harvard Square, Cambridge, MAJea-Lee was the man chosen for Sun by the matchmaker. After becoming friends with Sun he tells her that he met an American woman while studying Medieval Russian Literature and Hotel Management at Harvard. He plans to return to the US to marry this woman, but his parents do not know about it yet, so spending time with Sun is a cover for him.

properties.name: Jins hometown
properties.description: Posted by Burk504pusan, south koreaA small fishing village.

properties.name: Juliet Worked in Miami
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingMiami, FL, USAJuliet was doing her fertility research in Miami, working for her ex-husband. She was using her sister as a guinea pig in some kind of cuutting-edge experiment. The sister was bald and trying to get pregnant. Mabe she had had radiation therapy.

properties.name: Kate and her father bonded here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingFort lewis, WAKate says that her father was stationed in Fort Lewis and that she hunted and hiked with him here.

properties.name: Kate retrieves Tom's Plane
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingRuidoso, New MexicoKate held up a bank here just to get Tom\'s toy plane, which had been buried in their adolescent time capsule inn Iowa.

properties.name: Kate was once arrested here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingHarrison Valley, PAHer mugshot is from when she was arrested in Harrison Valley.

properties.name: Kings Cross, Australia
properties.description: Posted by Burk504king\'s cross, australiaKings Cross, Sydney, Australia is the place where Jack\'s dad, Christian Shephard, was found dead in an alley. This is a part of Syndney that is very well known for prostitution and drugs

properties.name: Libby broke a leg skiing here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing stowe, vtLibby claims to have attended medical school for one year before deciding to become a clinical psychologist. She spent time at Santa Rosa Mental Health Institute as a patient. At least part of her stay there overlapped with Hurley\'s time at the Institute. While at SRMHI, her hair color was brown. The reasons for her being institutionalized in the first place are still unknown, and whether or not her claims to being a clinical psychologist are true is also a mystery.

properties.name: Los Angeles
properties.description: Posted by Burk504los angelesHome of Jack, Hurley, Ana Lucia, Boone and Shannon. St Sebastian hospital is where Jack Shephard and his Dad worked. Mr. Clucks is also in LA.

properties.name: Lost
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThe TV show Lost is filmed here. This is the beach where the set for the crashed plane is at. I was camping out on that beach next to it for a few nights.

properties.name: Mittloes Bioscience is Supposed to be Located in Portland
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingPortland, OregonThe lab recruiting Juliette is supposed to be in Portland, OR. The recruiting video shows people hiking and loving the Pacific Northwest. Mittleos is an anagram of Lost Time.

properties.name: Nadia's supposed location
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingIrvine, CASayid is told that Nadia is working as a lab technician in Irvine to blackmail him into infiltrating the terrorist cell in Australia.

properties.name: Nathan says he is from Canada
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingCanadaBefore being tossed into the pit by Ana Lucia, Nathan says that he is from Canada and that he had been coming home from an Australian corporate retreat. Poor Nathan is mistaken for one of the Others, then killed by Goodwin, who is really one of them. Oh well, he seemed like a bit of a prick anyhow.

properties.name: Niagra Falls
properties.description: Posted by Burk504niagara fallsThis is where Bernard proposed to Rose. She then reveals that she has cancer and is going to die

properties.name: Nigeria
properties.description: Posted by Burk504nigeriaCountry in Africa where Mr. Eko is from

properties.name: Oceanic flight 815 headed toward Fiji
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingFijiWhen Oceanic flight 815 crashed, it was headed toward fiji.

properties.name: Ray Mullen's Farm
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingOutside Melbourne, AustraliaKate hid out on Ray Mullen\'s farm until he turned her in. Saving Mullen from the crash that happened during the chase with the Marshall prevents Kate from escaping, which is how she ends up captured and on the plane to LA. The farm is supposed to be about 100km outside of Melbourne. I just picked this spot out in the country. There is no "real" exact location for the farm, but this is close enough

properties.name: Rose is from the Bronx
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingBronx, NY

properties.name: Sam Tooney used the numbers here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingkalgoorlie, AustraliaAfter figuring out that the numbers he used to win the lottery are cursed, hurley goes to find Sam Tooney in Australia, who had heard them broadcast in the Pacific along with his friend Leaonard. Hurley got the numbers from L while he was in the mental hospital. When he gets to Tooney\'s house he learns that Sam had used the numbers to win a bean counting contest which had begun a chain of disastrous events in his own life, ending only with his death. Tooney\'s wife refuses to believe that the numbers are cursed. This all happens as a flash back in the episode where Hurley goes to find Rousseau after seeing a paper on which she had repeatedly written the numbers.

properties.name: Sawyer sends Cassidy to a hotel here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Sioux City, IAAt the end of his long con of Cassidy, Sawyer tells her to meet him in a hotel in Sioux City and that he\'ll meet her there in the morning.

properties.name: Sawyer's Hometown
properties.description: Posted by Burk504knoxville, tennesseeJames "Sawyer" Ford is from here.

properties.name: Sayid Jarrah's hometown
properties.description: Posted by Burk504tikrit, iraq

properties.name: Sayid served in the Republican Guard
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Bagdad, IraqSayid\'s past makes him both highly suspect and highly valuable. He has many skills and many demons. I\'ve never distrusted Sayid really, because he\'s never tried to hide anything.

properties.name: Seoul
properties.description: Posted by ZalgalSeoul, KoreaA wonderful city, not yet taken over by tourists. There are amazing museums, temples and historical areas

properties.name: Shannon and Boone are from Malibu
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Malibu, CAHome of perhaps the most dysfunctional family ever. Added to YouTube on March 26, 2006, 10:51 AM by maxwhitman

properties.name: Shannon and Boone have semi-incestuous relations here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   sydney, AustraliaBoone rushes to Sydney from California to rescue Shannon. He thinks that Sannon is in trouble with a bad boyfriend and he goes to Sydney to buy the boyfriend off. It turns out that Shannon was conning Boone to get money, but then it turns out that the boyfriend was conning Shannon. The complex con is a huge recurring theme in the show in general. Anyhow, Shannon shows up drunk at Boone\'s hotel room and blows the brother/sister facade totally out of the water by jumping Boone. The next day she says she wants to pretend nothing ever happened. Nice!

properties.name: Shannon learned a little French here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingSt tropez Shannon learned enough French to help decipher the bizarre looping transmission which is coming from the island. We later learn that the recordeing was made by Rousseau. The first seed of her romance with Sayid may have been planted in the scene where he encourages her to try to understand the transmission. He doesn\'t look on her condescendingly.

properties.name: Sun Kwon's Hometown
properties.description: Posted by Burk504seoul, koreaHer father is a crime boss here.

properties.name: Sun and Jin meet
properties.description: Posted by Weelidlemeseoul

properties.name: Sun decides not to betray Jin
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Sydney AirportSun was planning to betray her husband, who she believed had become a cold murderer and didn\'t love her anymore. She didn\'t know that he was planning to try to escape her mobster father in LA. He sways her with a sentimental gesture which reminds her of the time when they first were falling in love. Instead of walking out of the airport to start a new life and new identity, she takes her place by Jin\'s side on the fateful flight.

properties.name: Susan takes Walt to Amsterdam
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingAmsterdam, NetherlandsWalts mother Susan left Micheal to take a job in Amsterdam. After Micheal has a serious accident in New York, Susan returns to tell him that she is going to marry her boss Brian and that they are going to take Walt to Australia.

properties.name: Susan takes Walt to Rome
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingrome, ItalyAfter marrying Brian in Amsterdam, Susan wants to take Walt to Rome. Michael, recovering from his accident, tries to get an injunction to prevent her from taking Walt out of the country again. Susan convinces Michael to let Walt go and give up his parental rights. Her vision is that Brian will adopt Walt and that they will form a happy, normal family.

properties.name: Sydney Airport
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingsydney, AustraliaOceanic flight 815 takes off from Sydney toward Los Angeles. Before being eaten by the monster, the pilot explains that six hours into the flight they lost contact and flew way off course toward Fiji. This is the moment where a small group of characters learns that they definitley will not be rescued and has to decide whether or not to tell the others.

properties.name: Tallahassee
properties.description: Posted by Burk504TallahasseeWhere Sawyer caught veneral disease. He said to Jack something like, "Got a burn down in Tallahassee and it wasn\'t from the sun." Also where Kate was buying a bus ticket to when she was caught by the Marshall

properties.name: The Dharma Inititive's roots lie here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing503 Thompson St, Ann Arbor, MIKaren and Gerald deGroot were getting their doctoral degrees at the University of Michigan when they founded the Dharma Intiative in 1970.

properties.name: The Lost Island (4 8 15 16 23 42)
properties.description: Posted by JakeIf you type the mysterious numbers from Lost (4 8 15 16 23 42) into google maps, they correspond to the approximate latitude and longitude of an island in the middle of the Pacific. Zoom out a bit to see the island.

properties.name: Tom's family is here when Kate visits
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Cedar Rapids, IAWhen kate goes to Iowa to see her dying mother, she visits her high school sweetheart Tom, whose family is in Cedar Rapids.

properties.name: Tom's toy plane came from Dallas
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Dallas FW Int\'l AirportTom got his toy plane when he flew to Dallas by himself as a kid.

properties.name: Uluru or Ayers Rock
properties.description: Posted by Burk504ayers Rock australiaPlace where Bernard took Rose to get healed by Isaac of Uluru

properties.name: Walt lived with his mom and stepdad here
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingSydney, AustraliaThis is where Walt was living when his mother died, and where Micheal came to get him. The stepfather didn\'t want to keep Walt because he was afraid of Walt\'s mysterious powers (remember the scene where the bird flies into the window). The dog Vincent is also from Sydney. He belonged to Walt\'s father-in-law, but Micheal took him along because he could tell how much Walt loved the dog.

properties.name: Wayzata, Minnesota
properties.description: Posted by Burk504wayzataWhere the "real" Henry Gale was from. His drivers license said he lived at 815 WALNUT RIDGE ROAD WAYZATA, MN 55391 This Address does not actually exist

properties.name: Wayzata, Minnesota
properties.description: Posted by Fbiaswayzata, Minnesota USAThe real Henry Gale is from Wayzata, Minnesota

properties.name: home of John Locke
properties.description: Posted by Burk504tustin, californiaalso rumored home of Nadia, Sayid love from Iraq
